sentences: Püütavate kalade ja vähkide alammõö lubatud.
Tegelikult see oli lubatud heaks kiidetud.
context: The word 'lubatud' is the past participle form of the Estonian verb 'lubama', which means to allow or permit. It describes something that has been approved, permitted, or given authorization to happen. In the context provided from the ekss dictionary definition, it appears in relation to minimum size measurements for fish and shellfish, indicating what sizes are allowed/permissible.
